definition: path screened by walls on both sides
the Yongjiang river 甬江[Yong3 jiang1] through Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1]/abbr. for Ningbo
variant of 桶[tong3], bucket/(classifier) cubic dry measure (5 pecks 五斗, approx half-liter)

sentences.english: He went down the broad gravel path towards the building.
sentences.chinese: 他順着石子鋪的寬甬路，朝着那座大樓走去。

definition: winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
spirit wall (screen wall used to shield an entrance in traditional Chinese architecture)
road or pavement laid with flagstones
a narrow street (lined with walls)/to line the street
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
